channel.title: Swearing
channel.description:
Ok hopefully you all know what swearing is. Words like: "F***, Sh**, ect" well I have a theory of it can be bad AND good. Why can it be good because you can use these words Non-Offensively and Offensively. For Example Non-Offensively would be: "I f***ing love you!" - In my opinion I see that not offending anyone. In an Offensive way would obviously be like: "F*** you!" - Very offending phrase. In most peoples eyes just the word: "F***" is a bad word just hearing it. But its used as an adjective as well, you could put it in a non-offensive way. (Shown Above) I would just like to hear everyones opinions.
EDIT: Censored words just incase. :S

item.title: Swearing
item.dc:creator: @The_Cursed The Cursed
item.description:
@The_Cursed wrote:

[quote=“Dell451, post:57, topic:48419”]Well, I F***ing think that if you F***ing want to F***ing swear, then what the F***ing Hell, Swear all you F***ing want
Just cause I use a word, like Fuck, does that mean I should go to jail? If they say that you will go to jail or get fined for saying shit or fuck, or even nigger, does that mean i could say you would go to jail for saying rabbit, or duck, or hello? :mad:
That means they would have to take away our 1st Amendment, Freedom of religoin, EXPRESSION, and press.Why the hell stop there? Who needs the rights to protect oneself and his family from a threat? Lets get rid of our god given right to bear arms,And hey, so that way we can abloish the 8th Amendment, so i can be tortured to death for saying Fuck You, and shooting a man for hurting my family.

WHAT THE HELL
P.S. Im only 14, and this my first major rant, and hell is not a swear word.[/quote]
NIGGA, your reply is too fucking long, im not even going to fucking bother reading that long shit…fucking nigga i’m gonna pop yo brains outta ya fucking head, biaaatch

Read full topic

item.title: Swearing
item.dc:creator: @Dell451 Dell451
item.description:
@Dell451 wrote:

Well, I F***ing think that if you F***ing want to F***ing swear, then what the F***ing Hell, Swear all you F***ing want
Just cause I use a word, like Fuck, does that mean I should go to jail? If they say that you will go to jail or get fined for saying shit or fuck, or even nigger, does that mean i could say you would go to jail for saying rabbit, or duck, or hello? :mad:
That means they would have to take away our 1st Amendment, Freedom of religoin, EXPRESSION, and press.Why the hell stop there? Who needs the rights to protect oneself and his family from a threat? Lets get rid of our god given right to bear arms,And hey, so that way we can abloish the 8th Amendment, so i can be tortured to death for saying Fuck You, and shooting a man for hurting my family.

WHAT THE HELL
P.S. Im only 14, and this my first major rant, and hell is not a swear word.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

happy_world:

the word f*** is a bad word even if you put it in a good why its still a bad word. at the end of the day the world f*** is used mostly in a bad way so do not use it because it is a bad word and it is 99% of the time used in a bad way

Fuck…

Read full topic

item.title: Swearing
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

happy_world:

the word f*** is a bad word even if you put it in a good why its still a bad word. at the end of the day the world f*** is used mostly in a bad way so do not use it because it is a bad word and it is 99% of the time used in a bad way

Let me tell you this, I’m American, we have something called Freedom of Speech. While my viewpoints aren’t in total agreement with the government I’m going to say whatever the fuck I want. I don’t care if what I say is a ‘bad’ word or not because I have the right to use them. The views of right and wrong are dependent on each individual person so therefore I don’t beleive anyone to be right or wrong, unless it comes to the Laws of Physics or something.

Read full topic

item.title: Swearing
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Step 1, instead of ass say buns…
Like kiss my buns or you’re a buns hole.
Step 2, instead of shit say poo…
Like Bull poo, Poo, or this Poo is cold.
Step 3, in bitch drop the T…
Because bich is laten for generosity.
Step 4, don’t say fuck any more…
Cause fuck is the worst word that you can say,
so just use the word MMKKK…

You can do it, it’s all up to you Mmmkkkkk…
With a little plan you can change your life today…
You don’t have to spend your life addicted to Smack,
Homeless on the street given’ headjobs for crack.

I think I somewhat summed my feelings.

Read full topic

item.title: Swearing
item.dc:creator: @Darth_Afro56 Darth_Afro56
item.description:
@Darth_Afro56 wrote:

[quote=“kennyboy93, post:43, topic:48419”]I believe that swear words shouldn’t be used in most cases., but if you are having dufficulty speaking normally without them (ie, stopping everytime you would swear) then I think that you’re restricting yourself from expressing yourself.
I mean…if you swear 5 times in a sentence, everyone can tell that you would be a lot more agro than if you didn’t.[/quote]

Me personally I live in Venezuela, I talk with my friend with swear words, but I just don’t feel the word coming out of my mouth, nor does the receiver take the offense. It’s an automated habit and its non-offending but we ARE aware when were in the presence of our mom, teacher or representative, its the way you connect to people.

Read full topic

I believe that swear words shouldn’t be used in most cases., but if you are having dufficulty speaking normally without them (ie, stopping everytime you would swear) then I think that you’re restricting yourself from expressing yourself.
I mean…if you swear 5 times in a sentence, everyone can tell that you would be a lot more agro than if you didn’t.

item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

Darth_Afro56:

So you still read it and your eye gets a nervous impulse that send it to the brain retrieving the information, thus hearing it in you’re brain.

Thus reading it, you don’t hear with your eyes.
